mapper.select:
select a.* from ( select sg.id,sg.title,sg.summary,sg.content as gambit_content,sg.is_public,sg.is_rating,sg.create_date as gambit_create_date, ( case sg.user_type when 1 then (select ur.name from user_resident as ur where ur.id = sg.create_id) when 2 then (select udp.name from user_decoration_personnel as udp where udp.id = sg.create_id) when 3 then (select su.actual_name from sys_user as su where su.id = sg.create_id) end ) as gambit_name , ( case sg.user_type when 1 then (select ur.nick_name from user_resident as ur where ur.id = sg.create_id) when 2 then (select udp.nick_name from user_decoration_personnel as udp where udp.id = sg.create_id) when 3 then (select su.nick_name from sys_user as su where su.id = sg.create_id) end ) as gambit_nick_name, ( case sgt.user_type when 1 then (select ur.name from user_resident as ur where ur.id = sg.create_id) when 2 then (select udp.name from user_decoration_personnel as udp where udp.id = sg.create_id) when 3 then (select su.actual_name from sys_user as su where su.id = sg.create_id) end ) as theme_name , ( case sgt.user_type when 1 then (select ur.nick_name from user_resident as ur where ur.id = sg.create_id) when 2 then (select udp.nick_name from user_decoration_personnel as udp where udp.id = sg.create_id) when 3 then (select su.nick_name from sys_user as su where su.id = sg.create_id) end ) as theme_nick_name, sgt.create_date as theme_create_date,sgt.content as theme_content,sgt.like as like_num,sgt.is_delete from sys_gambit as sg LEFT JOIN sys_gambit_theme as sgt on sg.id = sgt.gambit_id ) as a
and a.gambit_create_date > #{beginDate}
and a.gambit_create_date < #{endDate}
and a.title like concat('%',#{title},'%')
and a.gambit_name like concat('%',#{gambitName},'%')
and a.gambit_nick_name like concat('%',#{nickName},'%')
and a.summary like concat('%',#{summary},'%')
and a.gambit_content like concat('%',#{gambitContent},'%')
and a.theme_content like concat('%',#{content},'%')
and a.theme_name like concat('%',#{themeName},'%')
select count(distinct user_type,create_id) from sys_gambit_theme_like where gambit_theme_id = #{id}
select count(distinct user_type,create_id) from sys_gambit_theme_comment where gambit_theme_id = #{id}
mapper.update: update sys_gambit_theme set is_delete = 0 where id = #{id}
update sys_gambit_theme set is_delete = 1 where id = #{id}
